casebody.data:
In the Matter of Darcel D. CLARK, etc., Respondent,
v.
George R. VILLEGAS, etc., Respondent, Dewayne Robinson, Appellant. 2017-900 Court of Appeals of New York. March 29, 2018 Chief Judge DiFiore and Judge Feinman took no part.

Motion for leave to appeal granted. Motion for poor person relief granted. Motion for a stay granted.
